website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for someone seeking the look and feel of an Apple product, but for a fraction of the cost.
pros: Quality build despite being an inexpensive keyboard
The keyboard runs on 2 AAA batteries
After 10 min of inactivity, the keyboard will automatically go into power-save mode to conserve battery power
The keyboard is equipped with many iOS keyboard shortcuts
We also found the keys to be highly responsive
cons: We would have liked to see backlit keys in this model

website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, low-priced keyboard with a few known flaws.
pros: It's easy to pair up this keyboard through Bluetooth, and the keys have a great feel to them
cons: The connection can experience a lag, and there is a tendency for random keys to not function occasionally

customer_reviews.title: GREATTTT
customer_reviews.text: I received mine today. It came EXTREMELY fast literally 1 day. I used it on my iPad Pro 12.9 (2018 model). It has great key travel and is very very easy to use. It connects very fast and types well. I uploaded a video of me typing for those interested.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna jord

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I only had to set up the Bluetooth connection once and now every time all I have to do is turn on the keyboard. This keyboard does not lay flat!! (Thank goodness! It comes with a little bit of an incline so that you can type easily (see pics).
customer_reviews.author: PinkyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Feels Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is definitely a good deal at a cheap price. I purchased it to use with my iPad Pro (2020). All the function keys work perfectly with iPadOS and the keys feel solid! I Would recommend this to anyone looking for a cheap and reliable Bluetooth keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Darling

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great performance.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to compliment an iPad stand in order to replace a laptop that reached the end of its service life. I was very concerned with the size, thinking it would make typing awkward - in fact, my wife has purchased and returned several comparably priced models for that reason. When this came in, I was pleasantly surprised. It’s well designed, easy to use, and extremely portable. I use it all the time and am still on my first set of batteries so I am equally pleased with that aspect of the keyboard. I’d purchase this product again, and plan on using it both at home, as well as packing it with me to take during travel.
customer_reviews.author: TDV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality, I Bought Two of Them
customer_reviews.text: This product is INCREDIBLE at this price point. Very well built keyboard, every bit as nice as my Apple keyboard, at such an incredible price, is this thing made out of nuclear waste or something? How is it this cheap? See my unboxing video for a review of this keyboard, but don't hesitate for a second to buy. I use it with my iphone 8 which is amazing because it makes my phone such a more powerful tool.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth/Wireless Keyboard -- Very durable, Easy to Carry, and Works Perfect on IPad 7th Generation
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth keyboard is just what I needed. It works extremely well with my iPad 7th Generation. I was able to get it in rose gold, which is my favorite especially since my iPad is a Rose gold color as well. It was very easy to connect via Bluetooth and all it uses is 2 AAA batteries and you are good to go. Easy to carry around because it is very lightweight, but durable at the same time. And the price was perfect. It works really really well. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronique Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what I've been doing without a Bluetooth keyboard but this is so easy to set up and use I am using it for all of my devices haha. Usually when it comes to connecting Bluetooth devices there is some issue or troubleshooting required but not with this keyboard! It instantly connected to my iPad (2019 version - 7th gen) and I used it in seconds of taking it out of the box. I then connected it to my laptop to test it out and boom, connected again. EASY! I highly recommend this keyboard if you have a tablet and want to use it on the go/airplane/train/etc. It is light and easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer 612

customer_reviews.title: It is designed to look like the apple wireless keyboard but the build quality is ...
customer_reviews.text: It is designed to look like the apple wireless keyboard but the build quality is poor. The keys do not have a solid sound or feel and the miss rate is too high. If you don't hit each key squarely you end up missing letters. I wish I hadn't purchased it. I've lived with it for several months and I've finally decided to purchase a better keyboard. I'd stay away from this unless you only plan to use the keyboard occasionally or to type short messages.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport, easy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Only regret is that I didn’t buy this sooner. I use a Surface Pro for work. It has an attached keyboard/cover. I bought this keyboard when I purchased an iPad Air. I have primarily used the keyboard for the iPad, but started using it for the Surface Pro as well. It works amazingly for both. The keys are not backlit, but that’s rarely an issue for me. And at this price point, it’s no big deal. The keyboard easily fits in my backpack and it’s light.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Button broke a couple months are I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to use with his school iPad and after a month or so one of the buttons fell off causing the keyboard to be useless. It worked great prior to breaking and was exactly what he needed to complete work on his iPad but I'm very disappointed with the quality. It wasn't used all day long or every day so it's disappointing that it would break so quickly with only moderate use. I actually bought two, a 2nd for my younger son to use with his iPad, because we loved it so much and I'm really hoping the other one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kruerm01

customer_reviews.title: Great , But...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice style, slim , light , it looks like an APPLE keyboard... BUT , lots of times it looses connection (I only use it with my desktop, never move it). If you stop typing for a few minutes and then just start again ... later to find out the first sentences weren't typed ! VERY ANNOYING. Then you can't connect until turning ON/OFF it again. It happens a few times a day. If you take a break , one must keep hitting one key until you see it on the screen
customer_reviews.author: Marco Nogueira

customer_reviews.title: Then I realized that the quality is bad. The keys are already falling and there is ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item two months ago. I was loving it. Then I realized that the quality is bad. The keys are already falling and there is no way to put them back. Of course now the one month return deadline has passed and I can't do anything. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO PAIR AND FANTASTIC TO USE
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of money for many keyboards over the last 30 years, some I loved and this one I LOVE. it paired great with my IPad Pro and I love it for how nice the keys feel and light for couch potato days when laying on the couch and on the computer is about all I want to do. I have only had it for a few days...but I feel OMOTON is a good name and I believe the keyboard will outlast the IPAD.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hamski

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard love
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. Its light weight so i can take it with me easily. The rose gold color is my favorite. The keys are easy to press. The connectivity was easy once I read some of the reviews. There is a connect button on the back of the keyboard that is right next to the power button, you just press it twice after turning on your blue tooth on your device. it should prompt you to enter a code that has popped up on your screen... you are now set type away....
customer_reviews.author: Mimie Wal

customer_reviews.title: Worthless with no escape key
customer_reviews.text: Do you need to force quit your mac with a keyboard shortcut, or simply exit certain edit modes in the Adobe suite? Well, if you're using this keyboard, you're out of luck my friend. The genius' at Omoton collectively lost their minds and decided to replace the exceptionally functional ESC key with a useless key of their own. Sure, I should have checked to see if the Omoton came with an ESC key, saving me a lot of time and money, but I honestly still can't picture in my head why anyone in the keyboard business would do such a stupid thing. Live and learn. Now if you'll excuse me, I have to buy another keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Raijer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for even though this product is "Amazon's Choice"
customer_reviews.text: For these being Amazon's choice for Bluetooth wireless keyboards, they are flimsy and not well made. Bought them for my kids to use with thier school provided iPads for learning online. I've only had them a week and on 2 of the 3 keyboards, a few if the keys are sticking and don't work. Also the color is coming off ! You get what you pay for! Surprised to see Amazon backing this one as thier "choice". Spend a little more to get better quality.
customer_reviews.author: BQ80501

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised at how great the typing experience is. I have a 6th gen IPad 9.7 and it is working great! This is just what I was looking for when ordering a keyboard for my IPad....small, lightweight, and functional. I might also add that the keyboard is stunning to look at. Set up was a breeze.....install batteries, turn on, and push the connect button, presto I am typing haha. Great add on to make my IPad fully functional as I am not fast enough to type on the screen and much prefer a physical keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, except...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look (and price) of this keyboard. In fact I love everything about it... except that the bluetooth keeps disconnecting after a short period of inactivity. I am in meetings most of the day, so I can sometimes go a while (30 minute chunks are not unusual) without typing anything. Then when I get off the (zoom or webex or whatever) call, and I go to type something, it will miss the first few words while it re-connects. This happens many times each day, and is very frustrating. I keep thinking i’ll get used to it, but after two weeks i’m ready to go back to my old keyboard and just keep this as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tl;dr: works, not very well
customer_reviews.text: I have one of the small magic keyboards (no numeric pad) that I use when traveling. Sadly, there was a minor accident that resulted in many of the keys getting very difficult to use (my fault, don't ask). I needed a replacement, and figured I'd try this non-Apple substitute that was, after all, cheap. Turns out also to be very noisy and, if there's an escape key, I can't find it. There's a key where escape is supposed to be, but it doesn't seem to do anything. Could be operator error, but it's not a major issue, since the thing is way too noisy for my purposes. Best news: I only lost a few dollars experimenting with brand X.
customer_reviews.author: Former Tanker

customer_reviews.title: Works well with one minor fix
customer_reviews.text: Love this little keyboard. The connectivity can be off sometimes but it hasn't happened enough to bother me, and that seems to be normal with anything bluetooth. I noticed that when typing, every time you hit the space bar the bottom of the keyboard bends/hits the desk. I fixed this by adding a little sliver of one of those poster mounting squares to the bottom and voila, problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Hermione

customer_reviews.title: Slow to connect, misses keystrokes & no ESC key!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Every time you want to use it (i.e. to type in your password) it takes about 10 seconds to connect to the computer, so you have to hit a key and then wait and wait until it connects before it will recognize that you've typed something. On top of that, there is no ESC key, and it constantly misses key strokes, or doubles them, so you have to go back and correct everything you've typed to add missing letters or remove extra ones you didn't intend. I've been using mine for a few weeks and I'm tossing it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT purchase for a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just start off by saying that I was a little skeptical about this purchase. For the price, it just seemed a little too good to be true, compared to many of the other high dollar keyboards out there. However, immediately after taking it out of the package and popping in two AAA batteries (as the keyboard is not rechargeable), I was quickly able to connect to my iPhone 6s and get to typing. This is an absolute game changer for me since I don’t have a computer and thus have to do all my typing on my phone. If for some reason this one was to stop working, or break I would def purchase again!! 5/5 for me!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This may not be the premium brand Apple’s version but I’m certainly satisfied with it! I really love it, it’s help significantly speed up my work flow (I hate touch tap typing the screen (Bc if you want to know lag and not picking up keys start using the on-screen keyboard of an Apple tablet after 6mo.!). The only reason for delays in my recording was bc of time trying to think about what to type. All in all a really great deal. And one that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Inky

customer_reviews.title: Works with the iPad not problem.
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. Battery power had been fine since I got it 4 months ago. My cat broke the “option” key but it can still press the base and get the command... so i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: SUPER convenient !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth keyboard is a vital part of my mobile studio which consists of the OMOTON Bluetooth keyboard, Akai controller, Samsung mic and my iPhone 11. It’s super convenient, works well, light weight, connects very easy, o really have no complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nigee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect keyboard for use with tablet/ipad/phone
customer_reviews.text: The OMOTRON keyboard is an excellent option for providing a quick, fast, reliable way to type quickly while on a phone or tablet. The bluetooth connection makes it easy to connect, regardless of where you might be. The feel of the keys are very similar to a laptop, providing the same consistency when moving between a laptop and a tablet. The size of the keyboard is perfect for taking with you on the go. I frequently work remotely, and with this little keyboard and my phone I can quickly and easily compose emails, take notes during lectures, and record important information from clients online - all without needing to tote around my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: S. Niemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I don't have a ton of bluetooth keyboards to compare this one to, but I'm definitely satisfied. Pros: Power supply - Takes AAA batteries instead of requiring a charger. Great size - Since it's not confined to the parameters of a case it's a good size for portability and still big enough for comfortable typing. Function keys - It allows for shortcut keys in iOS that quickly navigate home, control volume, brightness, lock screen, etc. Cons: None as of now, but I will update if it changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I am a college student and im constantly on my my iPad. So i bought this keyboard to be able to have more flexibility with being able to write my assignments. I absolutely love this keyboard and i use it all the time. The bluetooth connection is very good and its battery powered; all you need is 2 AAA batteries and it lasts a long time. This keyboard is one of the best products i bought on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Iovanna escobales

customer_reviews.title: A great replacement for Apple's bluetooth keyboard, compact and awesome
customer_reviews.text: After my 2011 wireless keyboard sadly died (pictured above without the caps lock key), I was searching for a cheaper alternative ($100, really??) to replace it. For such a great price, this is incredibly high quality. A nice bounce from the keys, exact same layout as the original Apple keyboard (see comparison photo), and great Bluetooth. Right now I'm using it with my MacBook Air on a stand for more comfortable typing and it works wonderfully. In fact, when I turn on my Mac, this keyboard actually connects faster than my original Apple Magic Mouse! Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: jennah137

customer_reviews.title: Handy gadget
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this much, but I’ve found it to be a useful product. I like that there’s a tilt to it rather than being flat. I was concerned it would be too difficult to type because of the size, but the buttons are well spaced apart and you can feel them easily so you can place your fingers on home keys easily. Getting it connected via Bluetooth was simple and I’ve had no issues thus far. This is a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Reading

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and effective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This little keyboard is surprisingly solid and elegant for the price. It looks and feels like a regular Apple keyboard. Add two AAA batteries (not included), turn it on, connect using your device bluetooth settings (and the punch in connect button at the back of the keyboard), then you’ll be all set to go. Not quite plug ‘n play, but almost. I bought this to use while I’m waiting for a delayed Smart Keyboard to arrive, and am very pleased with the quality and effectiveness of the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Oteaatea

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Useful...and it's Pink!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a Bluetooth keyboard to use with my laptop and this one is it! It is small and compact. Setting up the Bluetooth connectivity to my laptop was easy as well. I love the fact that it is pink too! In my predominantly blue and green life (the perks of being a boy mom), I love it when I can add a pop of pink anywhere! My only issue was getting used to the layout of the keys. It is small so that means readjusting your typing form (is that a thing?). Oh....and delete is not really delete. It is backspace. That took some getting used to. Overall, I am extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lovestoshop

customer_reviews.title: Great for price paid, Saves loads of time
customer_reviews.text: I paid about 20 bucks for this but it works like a much more expensive keyboard. My name brand bluetoth keyboard crapped out after a year but this little guy is still going strong. It connects reliably and functions as designed. It is a HUUUUGE time saver to be able to type on devices (I am typing on the keyboard through my phone now) . Works with my PC, Galaxy phone and Ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Morecowbell

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: So when I received the keyboard some of the keys were “popped” up so I just snapped them back in. Contacted the company as advised in their included mailer. Keyboard worked ok for a bit but I had to really press hard on those specific keys, sometimes repeatedly. Then after a few days it got really annoying. Emailed with the company for a few days & they offered to send me a new one. Just received it ... it’s good to go! I enjoyed this keyboard from the beginning & the company was quick to get my problem fixed 👍🏾 Easy to connect to Bluetooth. Light weight & easily transportable.
customer_reviews.author: Pua

customer_reviews.title: CONVIENNT, ATTRACTIVE,PRATICAL HANDWARE.
customer_reviews.text: THE KEY BOARD IS VERY NEAT IN POSTION. EASY TO CONNECT TO MY IPAD MINI 2 GENERATION. IT DO HAVE A SHORT GUDIE THAT IS EASY TO FOLLOW . MATTER OF FACT IM TYPING THIS REVIEW ON THE ITEM . NICE DESIGN QUICK REPONSE IN TOUCH . DID REALIZE I HAD THE CAP LOCK ON ....LOL. THE CONTROL ON THE KEYBOARD OPERATES THE IPAD ...ITS STILL NEW SO I'M FINDING OUT MORE AS I GO... LESS THAN 12 INCHES LIGHT WEIGHT AND FLAT WITH A SMA;LL TILT FORWARD .STAYS CONNECTED AT ALL TIMES..... A AWESONME BUY ....REALLY..
customer_reviews.author: gypsi rulez

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty bad...
customer_reviews.text: Either they changed the manufacturing process of this device or the reviews here highly inflated with fakes. They keyboard has very stiff keys that you have to press a very hard to get them to register. I'm looking for a Bluetooth keyboard that write some work emails on my phone. I was using just normal speech to text to do them but there were so many mistakes in longer emails plus on any decent keyboard I can type as fast or faster than I can talk. This was the highest rated Bluetooth keyboard but within 10 minutes of my first usage of it I bought a different Bluetooth keyboard we'll see how the Logitech k480 goes...
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Cool keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I got this little keyboard so I could give my poor thumbs a break. I keep it on my counter so I can plug my iPad in when I need to. Great for writing emails, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Joan H

customer_reviews.title: I’ll give it a “We’ll see” rating
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box. Inserted fresh batteries. Turned on the power switch. Nothing. Checked batteries and tried again. Nothing. No light. No Bluetooth connection. Dead piece of plastic. Returned. Revised review: OMOTON saw my previous review of a product that showed up dead and did something great. They sent another one free of charge. So kudos to them for customer service. This one worked out of the box and seems to be a decent little keyboard. The keys have a nice spring to them and there are functions to control certain things on the iPad from the keyboard. I’m wary of quality but hopeful that it will continue to work out well.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as Apple compatible as I'd like
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made Bluetooth keyboard and synced to my iPhone without any problems. It does give a nice keyboard alternative to the tiny iPhone keyboard sets, but (as far as I can tell so far) it doesn't assist you in any screen navigation functions, for example top of page, bottom of page, URL search bar, etc., so I was still going back and forth between the keyboard and the phone screen. I realize that a touchscreen based interface will not translate smoothly to a pure keyboard, but I was hoping for a bit more. I did order one for my daughter, so maybe I will be updating this post.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, great price
customer_reviews.text: I've just started using a smartphone and texting is my newest thing. But, my typing with one finger is too slow to keep up with the other friends that have been using their units for much longer. I wanted a bluetooth keyboard that I could use my touch typing skills to send faster, more accurate texts. This one fits the bill. Its keys are the right size and a near PC keyboard feel. Though it doesn't have a keypad, it still has all the qwerty keys for expert typing. It has an on/off switch, a sleep mode, and logs onto my phone effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T. King

customer_reviews.title: Everything is convenient, but...
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm giving four stars because there's one thing that's missing. Everything is great, the typing is fast reactive for a keyboard, the Bluetooth connects nicely, the keys aren't quiet or silent, but it's tolerable (not like those 90s bulky keyboard sounds which is good lol), however, charging, I was shocked it required batteries to operate this thing, like, we live in a time where most devices have the battery inside and is rechargable, it's like owning a phone that would constantly need to replace batteries from time to time. The bright side though, compared to phones lasting 8 hours of non-stop use, this keyboard lasts weeks before you need to change the battery.
customer_reviews.author: jolanta kramarz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my iPad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for iPad mini- connected immediately and very easy to use. Keys feel like the magic keyboard for iMac. Low and does not take much push. Batteries last really well.
customer_reviews.author: gardener97

customer_reviews.title: There are better keyboards out there
customer_reviews.text: It's got decent typing texture, but not great. AAA batteries required, which is a minor annoyance. You have to hold down the function key to make the Escape key actually mean "escape," which is really disorienting. But the biggest problem was that, after a couple of weeks it kept losing connection randomly, then I'd have to wait fifteen seconds to be able to type again. My quest for a decent portable keyboard continues. So far my favorite's been the Apple "Magic" keyboard. But at $99, I was hoping something cheaper would do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! We recently started using iPads at work and have to type up long reports. I love that I can easily connect this keyboard via Bluetooth and don’t have to worry about typing on the touchscreen keyboard. I am able to type up my reports in half the time that I was before and had less spelling corrections to make. I have only been using it for about a week, but the battery life seems to be good. I really like that you can turn it on and off so you aren’t wasting battery life while idle. It is made of solid material and seems to be pretty durable. I’m very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wanner

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth connectivity is crazy good. The box lists the distance tit will connect to be 30 feet, however, I walked about 50 (or more) feet away, and I was still able to type from that distance. The quality is excellent, especially for the price. My only small complaint is that the box does not list the type of batteries required, though it wasn’t very hard to find out. The batteries needed are common triple A. The keyboard shipped quickly, and was packaged very nicely. If I ever need a Bluetooth keyboard, I will definitely purchase again. Five stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomers

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to work with my iPad Air3 and it works like a charm. I followed the directions they provided to connect it with my Bluetooth and it paired up immediately. The keyboard doesn't feel awkward and there is good key response. I just held it next to my MacBook Air's keyboard and it is the same size (minus the trackpad, of course). So there is no learning curve to adjust to closer spacing of keys. Perfect size to slip into a backpack or computer bag when on the go.
customer_reviews.author: TXDidi

customer_reviews.title: Space key doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Stupidest waste ever. Already returned. Got this for my iPad 7th gen. Paired easy after I found 2 AAA’s.... not included, btw. Fired up Pages, typed one word, and crashed. Restarted. Same thing. Tried other apps. Same thing again. Then I saw in the reviews other people complaining about the same thing. They were right.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's mom

customer_reviews.title: BANG FOR YOUR BUCK
customer_reviews.text: I was real iffy about buying this. Something about a $16 Bluetooth keyboard just doesn’t sound right. HOWEVER, this thing is a straight up bang for your buck. I brought this with me to my Professional Military Training and it wrote many of papers via an iPad. The Bluetooth never failed, they keys are surprisingly good quality and I only used 1 set of batteries in 7 weeks. If you’re looking for a basic keyboard that connects to your tablet. You can beat this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Issues with connecting to Device
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is a great keyboard. As far as compatibility, it has connected to both my MacBook and my iPhone. It was a completely painless connection to my iPhone however the connection to my MacBook was kind of a pain. It took about an hour of me connecting and disconnecting to retry before the key board would pair and work. Once paired with the laptop it connects automatically every-time but the first connection can be painful. One the keyboard was connected it works great and I absolutely love it. Size is great and the keys feel nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: rockandroll

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is awesome!!! I have an iPad Pro 9.7 and it is perfect. The setup was super easy and quick. This is one of my favorite purchases for my iPad. If you want a keyboard for your iPad but don't want a keyboard case, this is the perfect solution for you. Lightweight and easy to use. You CANNOT beat the price for this. I am super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy setup
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It arrived quickly and right out of the box, connect to my iPad with three simple steps after installing batteries ...(make sure Bluetooth is accepting, turn on keyboard and then hold the “connect” button for a few seconds.) Be patient. You have to give it a minute to connect. Seems like it will work perfectly for me...it’s not super ergonomic but hugely portable and that’s what I was after. I’ll be back with an update if there are any issues, but what the heck do you want from a $14 keyboard except that it works?
customer_reviews.author: Buck Dashe

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently using this for my iPad Pro 11” and its works just great! I had no trouble connecting the Bluetooth. There was not really an instruction manual on how to use the keyboard but i just looked at and figure it out on my own. Light weight keyboard so I’m able to carry it with me (if i ever wanted too). My iPad Pro is the 11” so the keyboard is a little bit longer than my ipad but like i said it fits fine in my tote. Really good in my opinion for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works Flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bluetooth keyboard! I'm writing this very review using it. I bought this on Prime Day to enhance my iPad Pro experience and I'm so glad I did. Now it's like I'm working on a laptop (minus the mouse). The keyboard is responsive and doesn't lose connection. The keys have a nice "click" to them. And it has unleashed a variety of new shortcuts you can use. Many of the shortcuts for Mac are the same on the iPad Pro, but my favorite is probably the app switcher. Hold down Command and hit Tab until you reach the recently used app you want to open. Don't hesitate! This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Khaleesi

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek and compact
customer_reviews.text: Okay seriously, I am not an iPad lover. But this keyboard makes life bearable! I use an iPad 9.7 for work company issue, and I hate the fact that they don't have a number row without hitting a key going back and forth. So I purchased this to have a small keyboard, Bluetooth, and if I ever break it I will order another one right away this thing is fabulous, smooth typing, compact in size, and decent key depressions. It has an on-off switch and runs on batteries of course which I prefer to turn it off when I'm not using it anyway. Changed my life with my iPad! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Scott V.

customer_reviews.title: Slow to connect, but a very comfortable to use keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Slow to connect, but the actual keyboard is easy to type on (way fewer typos than on my smaller MoKo one). The only problem is that it is slow to reconnect when it goes into power save shut off. You have to go back to your setting, punch the button and search for it again. The price is amazing and generally its ok, but I will be looking for more easily connected keyboard in the near future. One more thing, in case you don’t realize it, this is battery operated, not rechargeable, so you’ll need to carry extra batteries if you go out and about with your iPad (I like to work in coffee shops).
customer_reviews.author: Emily K. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Had some issues, not any more.
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard worked for 30 days. Now no longer able to connect. Light flashes after pressing, device appears in my iPad Pairing windows with a code. Entering code now fails to work. Tried many times. Omoton quickly sent a replacement. Working as it should. This is a great option for light, full-sized portable keyboard for Apple iOS devices. Only change I would suggest is for power button to be on the top. Many companies have issues with a product or service. How they respond really makes a difference. Omoton deserves 5 stars for quick, positive response.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M Dornquast

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, quality keyboard with a few quirks
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a couple of months now. I use it with my ipad. The keyboard itself is quality—board doesn’t bend, keys are “clicky” and nice to use (unlike the new macbook keyboard), and it connects well w/o interruptions. For its low price, it’s a steal. However, 2 things: a) whenever I type, the digital keyboard still pops up most of the time which is obnoxious (you can press the button on the keyboard to lower it) and b) it takes batteries, which probably lasts like 3-4 days of CONTINUOUS use. Being rechargable is probably the better option. Since it is so cheap, I’m willing to overlook those cons. Good buy, working well so far
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this as an alternative to typing notes when my pc crashed. It worked as expected and I will be purchasing another one for the rest of my family to use. Very functional and compact to use when I’m in meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: For the inexpensive price, it works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: After the initial connection, it became a bit tricky to reconnect again after the keyboard went to sleep mode. At first, I would often go back into my iPad settings to reconnect via bluetooth, then I realized that the F5 button on the keyboard automatically reconnects. Much more convenient than having to close/switch the iPad windows to get to settings, then bluetooth tab, then reconnecting. The only annoyance is that sleep mode turns on after like a minute of inactivity which is too short. I wish I could set it to longer, but I haven't had to change the battery since I bought this keyboard 5 months ago. So, I guess it's a payoff.
customer_reviews.author: Bose Urieko

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard for price - customer service lackin
customer_reviews.text: I'm about to be on my 3rd one of these in the past year. After about 5 or 6 months, some of the keys just stop working. OMOTON refunded me for a replacement te firs time it stopped working. Now I'm experiencing the same issue. Customer service replied to my initial inquiry and sounded like they would send me another replacement. It's been half a day and I am yet to hear back after reaching out again. I am most likely going to consider another brand at this point. If your item is going to be faulty after use and you don't have te means to fulfill replacements/customer service requests promptly, ten don't sell that product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.BuysTooMuch

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a good keyboard. Light. Durable. All the keys work. It has the Apple 'option/command' key for use with my iPad. It connects easily enough and stays connected. The sleep mode comes on faster than I would like, and I have to hit several keys to get it working (or the same key three or four times), but that's really the only problem with it. It uses batteries and doesn't recharge on its own, but in some ways, that can extend the life of the keyboard, because the hardware could keep working long after an internal battery has died. This keyboard is worth the money and will be a useful tool for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: It’s works great! It’s easier than having a whole laptop and obviously more cheap. It helps a lot now that I have online school and homework. Bluetooth connects really easily however when backspacing its pretty slow. When typing though it’s fast. It’s just great and very convenient for me.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Jens

customer_reviews.title: Keycaps fall off super easily
customer_reviews.text: I am a high school student who puts this in my backpack in a fairly secure compartment of my backpack, and less than a week of using it, the keycaps have fallen off. I have tried to reattach them using the pieces that came off of the keycaps but no matter what, the mechanism just seems to not want to lock in. I do not recommend this product to anyone who needs to use a keyboard for a mobile device on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Keyboard (for light use)
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent Bluetooth keyboard, especially for the price. It takes two AAA batteries (I think - will need to double check) and is very easy to connect to devices. I wouldn't recommend it for those who game a ton. The keys' reaction time is just slow enough for there to be a delay. Not a problem with typing or light computer work, but enough it could mess up gameplay. It's lightweight and easy to store, great for travel or on-the-go. It fits with a tablet in a standard-sized carrying bag (like the Amazon tablet case - it'll hold both). I would recommend this to others who need a BT keyboard, especially for a tablet or mobile desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Schrodinger's Spy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had ordered year's ago!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. As a retired Admin. Assistant who typed over 100 wpm, it drives me bananas trying to type a message on my iPad by touching the screen with one finger. If I touch an i, it frequently gives me an o. If I touch the u, half the time it gives me an i. Besides taking so long, I really have to proofread carefully everything I type. This keyboard was packaged very securely and was easy to connect to the iPad via bluetooth. So far, I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is great. When my computer went in for repairs, I needed a cheap and easy way to be able to write essays on my IPad for my studies. I was nervous about getting a non-apple product to connect to my IPad because I had issues with styluses, but this keyboard was super easy to connect, requires two AAA batteries, uses bluetooth, is lightweight and portable, and types great. It is comfortable to type and is the perfect size for the 7th generation IPad. It feels like I have a full computer setup again. I would 100% recommend getting this over the apple keyboard if you are on a tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with how well this keyboard connects to a variety of PC and Android devices. Absolutely no problems getting it connected to anything I have in the house. High marks there. Also, the keyboard feel is very natural, and it's just big enough for my fingers to feel comfortable on it with minimal typos. This is a surprisingly competent, easy to use keyboard at a great price, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: surfbass

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about a month now. The tab key fell off and the keyboard works when it wants to. I’ve tried changing batteries. Disappointed Updated Review: After giving this keyboard one-star, they contacted me immediately. They sent me a replacement keyboard at their expense and refunded part of the money I spent on the initial keyboard. They even checked to see if the new keyboard worked properly. My new keyboard works great with my Ipad. I believe the first one was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Baybesis

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING LIGHTWEIGHT WIRELESS KEYBOARD
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with 2017 iPad Pro. Apple onscreen keyboard was terrible to use. Many typing mistakes. This wireless keyboard is a fantastic product. Well constructed, very attractive, paired quickly. Takes 2 AA rechargeable batteries. Most welcome is the feel of the keys when typing. I don’t like Apple’s attempt to thin their products down and then redesign their keyboards with a simulated feel. This feels like Apple’s older, real keyboards. I am very satisfied and the price was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: dunlin

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad cheap option.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last semester when I needed a cheap keyboard for my iPad. The keys feel good enough, and it definitely works. However, the lack of a built-in battery was inconvenient, the Bluetooth was a bit spotty, and the build quality is definitely low. After just a few months of usage and being carried around in a backpack, multiple keys had broken off. If you need a really cheap keyboard, it does work, but I'd recommend saving a little more to get a more trustworthy option (I recently got a great deal on the Logitech Slim Combo keyboard case, and it's miles better.)
customer_reviews.author: Ian Laird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Keyboard!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a wireless keyboard for the last few months and finally settled on this product and have NO regrets. It connected to my MacBook Air flawlessly and works wonderfully. There is no lag in typing between the keyboard and my laptop. The keyboard feels nice and sturdy and enters into a “sleep mode” after a certain amount of time of disuse. Pushing a button turns the keyboard back on and connects to the laptop with no problems! I also tried it connected to my phone and it connects and types well with that as well! You won’t regret buying this if you’re looking for a wireless/Bluetooth keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t rank the sleep mode because I’m not aware of that yet. It’s about has ergonomic as you’re gonna get for the price and size of these. No there is no adjustment to the height. Where the batteries go in, yeah that’s the height you’re getting. It clicks really well and the keys respond well. It’s about as large and spaced as most keyboards you would be using with a desktop minus the number pad. I enjoy typing on it for what little I’m using it. It connects easily to the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: bkate

customer_reviews.title: Keys to go!
customer_reviews.text: Connected right up, another Amazon basic that nails it. This with the Amazon basic stand allows me to turn my iPad gen 3 into a powerful laptop. Best of both worlds. This looks like stock Apple keyboard too. Throw it in bag with an on/off swith to save battery! It’s like 10$ but sturdy and still working well. I’m in a manufacturing environment with dust, severe ambient temps, and in general tough places. It’s just fine there.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Hamrick

customer_reviews.title: Maddening to use - cheap price not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Frequently goes to sleep, and Long delays unsleeping. (How bad is their passive power drain??) Seems to be made to match Mac styling, but then there's a non-standard "Escape" key that doesn't work the way "Escape" keys work on Mac keyboards. In total, I found this keyboard to be frustrating the point of being unusable. Yes, a low price point compared to the Apple keyboard, but the cost savings was simply not worth it given how frustrating this keyboard is to use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and the space-bar quit working right after the return period expired. I contacted the seller and they shipped a replacement out immediately - no charge and no questions! The keyboard is good - certainly not the feel of the apple wireless keyboard - but surprisingly good for the price. The first one obviously did not last long. The seller told me this kind of malfunction was not the norm. I will keep you posted on how this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Most keys stopped working after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these keyboards for our kids (7 & 9) to connect to their iPads and practice typing. They loved them! They worked great- at first. 6 weeks after receiving them one quit working. Some keys function- most don’t. We tried switching out batteries, but that didn’t help either. All keys with letters don’t work- which renders it useless. I’m hoping the second keyboard doesn’t do the same...
customer_reviews.author: Andy Solis

customer_reviews.title: Works terrific! Great addition to my online school office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my iPhone as I get several texts a day from parents during my online school classes. The keyboard works great and paired immediately with my phone. I don't mind the sleep feature--it only takes a second to wake the keyboard after its been sitting awhile. Its a great addition to my teacher set up. The keyboard is small enough to fit right by my computer but large enough to be comfortable for typing. Much better than using thumbs to text!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Church

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product came as I expected. It's slightly smaller than a standard keyboard and is almost identical to the keyboard for my iMac. The only differences that I can see are the things that make it compatible with an iPad like a home button and on/off button. It synced up via Bluetooth quickly and easily. I turn it off when not in use and when I turn it back on it is still synced up with my iPad. It looks and works as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Turns an iPad professional into a *very* portable terminal
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this with an iPad professional with LTE service and the Blink app to give myself extremely portable access to my Linux/Unix machines from anywhere with wifi or Verizon LTE service. It's much more usable than the on-screen keyboard when editing files. The only catch was the lack of a dedicated ESC key, though that's not a problem unique to this keyboard in any way. Tip: Try fn-Home. A bit awkward....but perfectly usable. As a heavy Macbook Pro and iDevice user, I appreciate the Appleesque layout of the keyboard overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Very useful keyboard. Quick connection.
customer_reviews.text: Out the battery in and connected to my iPad and my laptop. The connection was super quick and easy and it’s so much more easier to type on this keyboard than my actual laptop keyboard. It’s useful for when i need to use it with sidecar for school and work. I want to note though that i have the keyboard connected to the laptop and not the iPad at the same time. I use my iPad as a reference screen and type docs on my laptop. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Winelover89

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!  It’s a great little product.
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely loving this little keyboard! It is just the right size to throw in most bags, and you can’t beat the price. I use this about two hours a day and in the last two months have only had to change the batteries once. I love the way it feels and how it’s holding up. If you are looking for a great, sturdy little work horse, this is the keyboard for you. I also really enjoy the nice neutral colors and the size, while slightly smaller than your average keyboard, is still great for typing quickly on.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fast Connection
customer_reviews.text: I use this keyboard between 3 different Ipads at work. I'm impressed at how fast it connects. If it's connected to an ipad, when I turn on the Ipad again after logging off the screen for a while, the keyboard is quick to connect simply by tapping a key. Haven't had issues with it. I use it 5x a week, buttons are still attached, all buttons work, can't complain. Has made ease of documentation a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: ArayaLia

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard keeps timing out, have to wait for it to reconnect!
customer_reviews.text: I've been finding the auto-timeout feature to be very frustrating... because this is an otherwise good keyboard. I wish I could write a more favorable review, but every 5-10 min the keyboard disconnects from your device if it's not used. This means that every time you get up to make a cup of coffee or use the bathroom, the keyboard has disconnected by the time you return. This makes for a frustrating pattern of sitting down, beginning to type, realizing it's disconnected, waiting, then re-typing what you already typed. It's too bad... like I said this is an otherwise good keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I think it connects via bluetooth slightly slower than an Apple keyboard, but not much of a delay. Keyboard is very good for a touch typist, no problem with keys. I have not yet had to change the batteries, so I don't really know how long they last (a long time). Occasionally, the one I use with my iPad needs to be turned off and back on to connect - not sure why, but the one I am typing on now with my Mac never does that. Could be an iPad issue. Overall, you can't beat it for the price - feels like an expensive keyboard, and the feet keep it from moving around on your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Disconnection issues, but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have increased the rating on this product because the seller has great customer service. Based on my initial review they actually issued me a refund without my asking for it. The keyboard is nice and small since it doesn't have a number pad, its great for writing while traveling. *Original review. This product worked well for a few days but now continually disconnects from my ipad. Ive tried others that dont have any disconnect issues. This product is cheap and there is a reason, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Covid19
customer_reviews.text: I needed a better work from home setup during our current pandemic. I have a MacBook pro but the Apple branded wireless keyboard was a bit too pricey for me. Saw that this had good reviews, and a few weeks in I'm very happy with the purchase! It feels fairly similar to the mac keyboard and it looks and works great. I need to figure out how to map the escape key to the uppermost lefthand key, but other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: seltzerwater

customer_reviews.title: Great..... for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's just another thing to remember to put in the bag. We lost our keyboard that fit like a cover and we purchased with the ipad. I'm not spending another 100 $$ to replace it. (I know it's buried in this house somewhere) Had a little trouble connecting to the bluetooth but turned it off....then back on and it works just like ant other keyboard. It might be a little louder as it has plastic keys instead of rubber but it was only $20.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood!

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and easy customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product all through the 2018-19 school year and it was very helpful. A couple keys fell off as it was loose in my backpack, but a keyboard case easily fixed that problem. I pulled it out around the beginning of the 2019-20 school year to find that it wouldn’t turn on. I emailed OMOTON customer service about it and they were extremely helpful! They gave me some trouble-shooting things to try, and when none of those worked, they sent me a new keyboard free of charge. My experience with OMOTON was really great and I highly recommend their products.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey A Bomgaars

customer_reviews.title: Super company and great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter that write a lot on her iPad. She loves it. Within the hour of getting it, she had over 600 words in her story, and couldn’t stop going on about how much she loved it. I was very impressed with the customer service of the company. They emailed me the next day to make sure I didn’t have any issues, and was able to connect properly. Great company, and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Connects easy and works well
customer_reviews.text: This cost effective Bluetooth keyboard is greater. It connected to my iPad without any fuss. It has the apple keys needed for apple functions (and they work). The battery life is really good, I’ve been using it for about a month (not constantly but for about an hour daily) and haven’t had to replace the battery. I have had the genuine apple version of this keyboard and this one is lighter and feels a bit ‘cheaper’ but I think it was great for the price. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: M. Tarin

customer_reviews.title: Why did it take me so long to get one of these!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has made my life so much easier. I have it paired with my iPad and I can type essays, make powerpoints, create spreadsheets, etc with this keyboard. It can adjust brightness, volume, etc and it can lock my iPad screen. It’s extremely light (lighter than my iPad!) and the battery life is fine so far. The keys are quiet enough not to disturb people around me in the library or a quiet setting, and since I got the white model its easy to clean and keep tidy. I’m so glad I purchased one!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Work great! I decided to buy this keyboard because I have the iPad and my son need this for typing for his project,he got the project done real quickly.The Keyboard is easy to use, easy to connect, and use only 2 AAA batteries.It is very cheap great quality.
customer_reviews.author: tara2547

customer_reviews.title: First Impression: A Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: I will update if a poorer quality reveals itself in the coming months but, for now (1 week in), let me just say that this keyboard is an excellent purchase especially for the money ($15 as of this writing). I've experienced no lag while typing at high speeds, no connectivity issues, and the construction seems solid and durable. Having it really helps my iPad feel like a mini-Macbook.
customer_reviews.author: SingingDesigner

customer_reviews.title: I am sooooooo in love with this
customer_reviews.text: I am sooooooo in love with this. I just received it put the two triple a battieries in and synced it with my iPad and iPhone and immediately started to type. I’m seriously in love with this and for the price I definitely RECOMMEND BUYING THIS. and it’s so pretty. It’s a light white silver like finish. So easy to type on. It has a battery light to let u know when the battery is going low etc. DEFINITELY YOUR WIRELESS BLUETOOTH KEYBOARD IM IN LOVE. 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: DAWN

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, solid, durable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I spilled coffee on my mac and keyboard was done. Got this keyboard on dec 2, 2018 and it H\has been working well for 3 months. Haven't needed to change the battery yet. There is a little bit of lag when blu-tooth is connecting but not a big deal. It was either this or spend some big time money for another laptop. I will eventually buy a new laptop but in the meantime keyboard has been working exceptionally well. So for those of you who spilled coffee on your laptops and the keyboard is fried, this is the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard works as it should, connects easily in IOS. Was looking to sorta make a small second setup for working from home due to Covid but I find typing on this keyboard not very enjoyable. Keys aren’t very tactile and find myself constantly checking if the keys registered. Going to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard. It was exactly what I expected and was easy to hook up to my iPad. My biggest issue is the battery usage. It does not have a sleep-mode, and it has gone through four AAA batteries in the short time I’ve used it. Granted, I did forget to turn it off once. It just doesn’t have the life I’d hoped for. Would probably be happier with a rechargeable keyboard instead, but this one will work for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Wygle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Keyboard for tablets or iPhones.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, a keyboard for my iPad Pro 12.5”. It feels just like a regular desktop keyboard, even sounds the same. I didn’t have any issue receiving the item quickly, pairing it to my iPad and ability to use. I’d highly recommend this. I’ve only had it 4 days but so far so good! I don’t know what Sleep Mode is, but hopefully that saves battery. This keyboard takes 2 AAA batteries, which I can’t see lasting too long? We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this keyboard. I needed one for my iPad so I could multitask better between my iPad and laptop. The keyboard Connected to my iPad via Bluetooth with no problem. There is no lag between typing and appearing on the iPad. Its exactly like my MacBook keyboard and I like that. This is perfect for me while multitasking between my laptop and my MacBook while doing course work.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great option for price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard to use with my MacBook Pro, in an effort to try and find something good that was a fraction of the price of the Apple branded BT keyboard. I am very pleased with this keyboard. For the price, it is good quality and has great connectivity. I connected it very easily to my MacBook Pro. It will turn off after about 10 minutes of no use, and it shows a pop up on my screen “disconnected.” But simply press any key, and it will quickly reconnect and show a “connected” message on screen. I am very happy with this keyboard as a very inexpensive alternative to the name brand ones!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schock

product_meta.title: OMOTON Ultra-Slim Bluetooth Keyboard Compatible with iPad 10.2-inch/ 9.7-inch, iPad Air 10.5, iPad Pro 11/12.9, iPad Mini 5/4, iPhone and Other Bluetooth Enabled Devices, White
feature_bullets: 1. Cable-Free. Bluetooth Connection with your Mobile Devices such as Tablets and mobile phones, Bring you more convenience when you need to type, Operating Distance up to 10 meters.

2. Super Compatibility. Compatible with iPads, iPhones and Bluetooth-enabled Tablets, Laptops, and Mobile Phones, such as New iPad Pro 12.9 /11 inch 2020 Release, iPad 10.2 2019, iPad air 10.5 2019, iPad mini 5 2019, iPhone Xs Max etc.
3. Reasonable Layout. QWERTY Layout with Hot keys Customized for iPads, Including Volume, Music Control, Brightness etc.
4. Long Battery Life. 30-days continuous use and automatic sleep mode allow up to half a year between battery changes. (2 X AAA Battery, Not Included)
5. Perfect Size. Just Big Enough for your fingers to enjoy a wonderful typing, and small enough to put it into your suitcase/handbag. And OMOTON provides you friendly customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,775 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #1 in Tablet Keyboards#3 in Computer Keyboards
